name: Scilab Unit Operation Model File
summary: Learn about .SUM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: A unit operation is one part of a chemical process that involves chemical transformation or physical change. The Scilab CAPE-OPEN Unit Operation is used for calculating these steps and entering them in Scilab.
NOTE: In order to run Excel CAPE-OPEN Unit Operation you must have Scilab installed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
